resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
romainfrancois opened a new pull request #11366:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11366


   ``` r
   library(arrow, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
   #> See arrow_info() for available features
   
   a <- Array$create(c(1, 2, 3))
   b <- Array$create(a$as_vector())
   
   # different shared_ptr
   a$pointer()
   #> <pointer: 0x7f9617c99040>
   b$pointer()
   #> <pointer: 0x7f9617cf9b50>
   
   # but they both point to the same underlying Array*
   arrow:::test_same_Array(a$pointer(), b$pointer())
   #> [1] TRUE
   ```
   
   <sup>Created on 2021-10-08 by the [reprex package](https://reprex.tidyverse.org) (v2.0.1.9000)</sup>


--

romainfrancois commented on a change in pull request #11366:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11366#discussion_r725456816



##########
File path: r/src/altrep.cpp
##########
@@ -629,6 +629,24 @@ SEXP MakeAltrepVector(const std::shared_ptr<ChunkedArray>& chunked_array) {
   return R_NilValue;
 }
 
+// borrowed from
+// https://github.com/r-devel/r-svn/blob/6418faeb6f5d87d3d9b92b8978773bc3856b4b6f/src/main/altrep.c#L37
+#define ALTREP_CLASS_SERIALIZED_CLASS(x) ATTRIB(x)
+#define ALTREP_SERIALIZED_CLASS_PKGSYM(x) CADR(x)
+
+std::shared_ptr<Array> vec_to_arrow_altrep_bypass(SEXP x) {
+  if (ALTREP(x)) {
+    SEXP info = ALTREP_CLASS_SERIALIZED_CLASS(ALTREP_CLASS(x));
+    SEXP pkg = ALTREP_SERIALIZED_CLASS_PKGSYM(info);

Review comment:
       Sure. 




--

romainfrancois commented on a change in pull request #11366:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11366#discussion_r725942531



##########
File path: r/src/altrep.cpp
##########
@@ -629,6 +629,24 @@ SEXP MakeAltrepVector(const std::shared_ptr<ChunkedArray>& chunked_array) {
   return R_NilValue;
 }
 
+// For context, see
+// https://github.com/r-devel/r-svn/blob/6418faeb6f5d87d3d9b92b8978773bc3856b4b6f/src/main/altrep.c#L37
+#define ALTREP_CLASS_SERIALIZED_CLASS(x) ATTRIB(x)
+#define ALTREP_SERIALIZED_CLASS_PKGSYM(x) CADR(x)
+
+std::shared_ptr<Array> vec_to_arrow_altrep_bypass(SEXP x) {
+  if (ALTREP(x)) {
+    SEXP info = ATTRIB(ALTREP_CLASS(x));
+    SEXP pkg = CADR(info);

Review comment:
       and this should be `ALTREP_SERIALIZED_CLASS_PKGSYM`

##########
File path: r/src/altrep.cpp
##########
@@ -629,6 +629,24 @@ SEXP MakeAltrepVector(const std::shared_ptr<ChunkedArray>& chunked_array) {
   return R_NilValue;
 }
 
+// For context, see
+// https://github.com/r-devel/r-svn/blob/6418faeb6f5d87d3d9b92b8978773bc3856b4b6f/src/main/altrep.c#L37
+#define ALTREP_CLASS_SERIALIZED_CLASS(x) ATTRIB(x)
+#define ALTREP_SERIALIZED_CLASS_PKGSYM(x) CADR(x)
+
+std::shared_ptr<Array> vec_to_arrow_altrep_bypass(SEXP x) {
+  if (ALTREP(x)) {
+    SEXP info = ATTRIB(ALTREP_CLASS(x));

Review comment:
       If we do define the macros, then we should use them, this should be `ALTREP_CLASS_SERIALIZED_CLASS` instead pf `ATTRIB`

##########
File path: r/src/altrep.cpp
##########
@@ -629,6 +629,24 @@ SEXP MakeAltrepVector(const std::shared_ptr<ChunkedArray>& chunked_array) {
   return R_NilValue;
 }
 
+// For context, see
+// https://github.com/r-devel/r-svn/blob/6418faeb6f5d87d3d9b92b8978773bc3856b4b6f/src/main/altrep.c#L37
+#define ALTREP_CLASS_SERIALIZED_CLASS(x) ATTRIB(x)
+#define ALTREP_SERIALIZED_CLASS_PKGSYM(x) CADR(x)

Review comment:
       The macros should perhaps go to arrow_cpp11.h, e.g. this pull request would use them: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11369 too. 




--

   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = 39875f1c9581226c38f24ad3515f831b729fe4d6 and contender = edcea6c6b183b991e1906415e73a3f56d328e553. edcea6c6b183b991e1906415e73a3f56d328e553 is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/61fcc86e084549f79ecb9e9341eac477...b92270f8194d44fb91c50bf48ca7bab7/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/29f6e42790c84a80be2e27afa7de24f2...13837040f60d480db24f51fd37c739df/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-thinkcentre-m75q](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/3a7380e03efd4b5d88f1761f331663e2...9235a01d99da4ca98c880c83a8f7e56b/)

   ursa-i9-9960x: langs = Python, R, JavaScript

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: When we have an R vector that was created from an Array with altrep, and then we want to convert again to an Array, currently it materializes it, and it should not. Instead it should be grabbing the array from the internals -of the altrep object.
fields.summary: [R] converting from R vector to Array when the R vector is altrep
